# Fee Module â€“ Overview

Goal:
Implement a BASIC fee/billing system (Level 1 only).

Scope:

- No online payments
- No discounts
- No fines
- No invoices PDF

Target Users:

- ADMIN: manage fees
- STUDENT/PARENT: view-only

Dependencies:

- studentClass
- class
- academicYear

Read `schema.prisma` before proceeding.
